overview: This engaging documentary follows rabid Boston Red Sox fans, focusing on two of the team's most devoted supporters -- columnist Mike Barnicle and Chris Wertz, who owns a sports bar in enemy terrain: New York City. As they back the Bosox through the 2007 season, the self-proclaimed members of the Red Sox Nation discuss the thrilling 2004 World Series victory that united the city after decades without a championship.
title: Blessed: Still We Believe 2
